apps.title: Phone Sensor
apps.description: Includes GPS, accelerometer, gyrometer, and ambient light sensors
apps.detail_description: Phone Sensor: Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google, based on the Linux kernel and designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.

apps.title: AutoSense
apps.description: Includes a 3-axis accelerometer, a RIP sensor, an ECG, a GSR sensor, and a skin temperature sensor
apps.detail_description: AutoSense: Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google, based on the Linux kernel and designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.

apps.title: MotionSense
apps.description: Includes optical heart rate, 3-axis accelerometer/gyro, ambient light, skin temperature, UV sensor, capacitive sensor, galvanic skin response, and barometer
apps.detail_description: MotionSense: Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google, based on the Linux kernel and designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.

apps.title: Self Report
apps.description: Allows a participant to record information about activities or behaviors
apps.detail_description: Self Report: Android is a mobile operating system developed by Google, based on the Linux kernel and designed primarily for touchscreen mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.
